meta_description: Sacramento Children’s Museum inspires learning through interactivity for kids and adults. See our exhibits and ongoing programs for families and educators!
hours_text:
[](http://)

**Monday: Closed**  
Tuesday: 10:00am – 3:00pm  
Wednesday: 10:00am – 3:00pm  
Thursday: 10:00am – 3:00pm  
Friday: 10:00am – 3:00pm  
Saturday: 10:00am – 4:00pm  
Sunday: 10:00am – 4:00pm

### MEMBER-ONLY HOURS

### Tuesday – Sunday

### 9:00am – 10:00am

Reservations are no longer required!

[](http://)

Being a member has so many benefits, including unlimited visits for an entire year! Check out our different levels to see what fits your needs best.

[Memberships](/memberships "Memberships")

[](http://)

Celebrate any occasion with family and friends at Sacramento Children’s Museum! Check out our Party Rental details and pricing.

[Birthday Parties](https://sackids.org/birthday-parties/)

### Educators

**SCM is open for field trips!** Visiting SCM will give your students a hands-on, multi-sensory, activity-based experience! If you have not been to SCM, we invite teachers to come see what we have to offer with a free walk-through of the museum with a staff member! Please call [916-730-5079](tel:9168202406) to schedule an appointment with a member of our team.

### Out-of-Town Guests

If you’re coming from out of town, the [Sacramento Convention & Visitors Bureau](https://www.visitsacramento.com/) offers a number of resources that may be helpful as you plan your trip. For a list of local hotels, visit [Rancho Cordova Travel and Tourism’s website](http://www.visitranchocordova.com/).

## What to Expect During Your Visit

collections_text:
# Come Learn and Play With Us!

Our mission is to spark a passion for life-long learning. We will accomplish our mission by providing a place where children are encouraged to think for themselves, expand their problem-solving abilities through creative exploration, and exercise both their bodies and their minds.

[Visit](https://sackids.org/visit/ "Visit")[Membership](https://sackids.org/memberships/ "Memberships")[Group Visits](/field-trips-to-scm/ "Group Visits")[Van Go!](https://sackids.org/van-go/ "Group Visits")

Adults & Children (12+ months) – **$10.00 each**

Grandparents/Seniors – **$8.00 each**

Military/Veterans* – **$8.00 each**

[Museums For All](https://sackids.org/general-admission-access-program/)* (Up to 4 admissions) – **$3.00 each**

ACM* (Up to 6 admissions) – **$5.00 each**

ASTC* (Up to 6 admissions) – **FREE**

Current [Museum Members](https://sackids.org/memberships/) – **ALWAYS FREE**

* Must show proof and ID, restrictions apply.
